title: Message to the Regional Conference of the New Jersey Chapters of the American National Red Cross.
text:
My dear Mr. Eisner:

Please present my greetings to those assembled for the annual Regional Conference of the American Red Cross at Fort Monmouth. I trust that the deliberations of the representatives of the New Jersey Chapters may be fruitful in effective plans to meet the current demands upon the organization. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. Monroe Eisner, 107B Monmouth Street, Red Bank, New Jersey]
